question: Recently launched ‘Bharatiya Poshan Anthem’  has been penned by which writer?
explanation: \"Bharatiya Poshan Anthem\" was launched on December 3, 2019 which aims at taking the message of making India malnutrition free to all corners of the country. The anthem has been penned by noted lyricist Prasoon Joshi and sung by Shankar Mahadevan. Poshan Abhiyan was launched by Prime Minister Narendra Modi in March 2018 with an objective to make India malnutrition free by 2022.
